title: House for Sale at Kolonnawa
details:
A completely newly refurbished house located in a gated community, 3 bedroom upstairs house for sale in Kolonnnawa, 3.5 - 4 perches land extent, living, dining, pantry, outdoor kitchen or can be used for storage, TV area and a moderate garage. The house is fully tiled comes with WIFI, Dialog TV and few furniture are included in the price.

Price- 15.5 million is negotiable price and selling for highest offer.
